attributes.action: Build more Hospitals and Dentists UK
attributes.additional_details: Look at where the tax payers money is actually going!, you have people who worked in this country all there life, and paid taxes in the promises when the retire they will be comfortable and looked after etc, and you can't even get an appointment at your GPS! People are dying on trolleys in hospitals, why are we sending money over seas? To other countries, when ours in crisis? Look after UK first, Make it great Britain again! not Broken Britain! Invest in our NHS and dentists! Make these jobs appealing for young people so they would want to apply for these jobs look after your people
attributes.background: Rather than send money over seas, Our NHS is at breaking point! 60hour waits in hospitals to get beds, people on year waiting lists to see a dentist, not enough staff, under paid staff! We want to save our NHS! And would be happy if our tax was covering it but it's not!

rejection.details:
You might wish to sign these instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/748885
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/743481
